required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Apatinib Combined With S-1 for the Treatment of Recurrent/Metastatic Head and Neck Malignancies
clinical_study.official_title: A Single Arm,Open Clinical Study of Apatinib Combined With S-1 for the Treatment of Recurrent/Metastatic Head and Neck Malignancies

brief_summary.textblock: This open, single-arm, exploratory study looked at the efficacy and safety of apatinib in combination with S-1 as second-line treatment of advanced head and neck malignancies.

arm_group.description: Patients with recurrent/metastatic head and neck malignancies received apatinib plus S-1 as second-line therapy.

intervention.description: Apatinib 500mg qd plus S-1 50mg bid d1-d14/28d cycle
